channel.title: CVE Feed for Elementor.com -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elementor.com -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47505|2024-08-02T21:09:37.234Z -- elementor.com -- elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Elementor.Com Elementor allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Elementor: from n/a through 3.16.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-48777|2024-08-02T21:37:54.957Z -- elementor.com -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Elementor.Com Elementor Website Builder.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from 3.3.0 through 3.18.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-48777|2024-03-26T20:49:39.328Z -- elementor.com -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Elementor.Com Elementor Website Builder.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from 3.3.0 through 3.18.1.
